DOC.criteria: Healthy men postmenopausal woman Gastrointestinal disorder Bleeding disorder Peptic ulcer disease Cholecystectomy Seizure disorder Asthma Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease Urinary tract obstruction Cardiac conduction abnormality , include limited `` sick sinus syndrome '' unexplained syncopal episode Inability tolerate oral medication Inability venipunctured and/or tolerate venous access
